source_vectors.why: Canonical design map framing PhaseCube and lens architecture goals.
constraints: Keep systems decentralized and anti-singularity.
Honor harmonic fusion and forgiveness motifs for stability.
Use PhaseCube as safe on-ramp toward Lyriel behaviors.

source_vectors.why: Baseline PhaseCube philosophy, constraints, and minimalism targets.
constraints: Bias acts as influence only and must decay.
Avoid collapse via stochastic phase flips and parity asymmetry.
Stay single-file/minimal and human-readable where possible.

source_vectors.why: Reference implementation of audio-biased ternary lattice with UI affordances.
constraints: Map audio/inputs to bias fields without overwriting internal state.
Provide tunable probabilities for path selection and visibility.
Expose controls for pause/save/analyzer for interpretability.

source_vectors.why: System architecture and configuration guidance for PhaseCube core dynamics.
constraints: Maintain 4096-style grid logic with plasma/liquid/solid phases.
Use probabilistic Path B for divergence and ALPHA damping for memory.
Keep rendering/loop modular for future scaling.

source_vectors.why: Four-lens framework informing lens mixer and harmonic balancing.
constraints: Model Human, Predictive, Systemic, Harmonic lenses as separable weights.
Use harmonic feedback to stabilize fused decisions.
Keep architecture modular and extensible.

source_vectors.why: Swarm consensus mechanics and oracle/witness metaphors for multi-grid influence.
constraints: Favor distributed consensus and soft bias propagation (gossip/oracle style).
Preserve noise-driven oracle selection analogs (parity jitter).
Support repository-like persistence through delay/replication.

source_vectors.why: Kenotic forgiveness operator inspiring damping of divergence.
constraints: Apply forgiveness when dispersion exceeds a threshold.
Track dispersion/entropy proxies to trigger damping.
Keep core loop simple and traceable.

source_vectors.why: Prior delta with tri-grid dialogue and lens stack guidance.
constraints: Allow multi-grid or delayed bias exchange without hard sync.
Expose live tunables for lens weights and delay strength.
Mark TODOs for audio input and scale-up paths.

source_vectors.why: Delta emphasizing forgiveness damping and bias decay semantics.
constraints: Implement forgiveness damping tied to dispersion spikes.
Keep bias pulses decaying and non-destructive.
Show overlays/metrics for coherence and dispersion (headless metrics here).

source_vectors.why: Lens fusion delta with trace/imprint memory and modular bias plumbing.
constraints: Route bias through systemic/lens pathways rather than direct control.
Provide dual memory tracks or delay-like persistence.
Keep code modular, tunable, and human-readable with TODO hooks.

summary: Implements Delta LKB20250314A1B2 with a lens-aware headless PhaseCube runner, forgiveness damping, decaying bias field, and delay-line persistence for traceability.
